text:
A Reunion, Song And A Surprise Concert In NYC: Jonas Brothers Are Indeed Back And How!
A Reunion, Song And A Surprise Concert In NYC: Jonas Brothers Are Indeed Back And How!
After depriving their fans of their awesomeness for five years, Jonas Brothers are finally back and how! After announcing their reunion and dropping their latest song, they even performed live in a surprise gig in NYC.
Joe,Kevin and Nick Jonas surprised a group of excited fans as they took the stage at The Box Theater in New York City on Friday.
Screengrab
This happened on the very day when the brothers unveiled their song "Sucker," which also happens to be their first single in five years.
They took all their fans on a nostalgia trip as they performed on their hit songs including "Burnin' Up," "S.O.S.," "Year 3000" and "That's Just the Way We Roll."
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 186 SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES
Fans also got a first hand experience of them performing and singing their latest song Sucker live. The news of their surprise concert was confirmed when the band's official Instagram posted a video of them with a caption: "If you know, then you know 😎 @theboxnyc."
title: A Reunion, Song And A Surprise Concert In NYC: Jonas Brothers Are Indeed Back And How!
description: Fans also got a first hand experience of them performing and singing their latest song Sucker live. The news of their surprise concert was confirmed when the band's official Instagram posted a video of them with a caption: "If you know, then you know 😎 @theboxnyc."
